identity.mission: Create a top 1% family finance dashboard that blends 'Control Room' precision with 'Family' warmth.
principles: Content is King: Data tells the story
Zoom In: Focus on the numbers that matter
Negative Space: Don't clutter the dashboard

headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Major metrics

mono.usage: Financial data, currency values, account numbers

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)] transition-all duration-300

cards.summary: glass_card p-6 flex flex-col justify-between hover:border-blue-500/30 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 transition-all

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login page with overlay

family_placeholder.usage: Placeholder for family settings or welcome screen

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for elegance, 2px for active states

login.layout: Split screen or Centered Card on Abstract Background

general: Implement the 'Midnight Electric' color palette strictly.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'JetBrains Mono' for all currency values.
Ensure all cards have a subtle glass effect (backdrop-blur) to feel modern.
Use Recharts for all data visualization.
specific: For the Dashboard, use a CSS Grid layout that adapts from 1 column (mobile) to 4 columns (desktop).
The 'Summary Cards' should look like physical cards with a slight glow on hover.
The Import page should feel like a 'wizard' or a focused task - minimal distractions.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text, only for backgrounds or borders.
Use 2-3x more padding than standard Tailwind defaults (e.g., p-6 instead of p-4).
Ensure high contrast for text (WCAG AA compliance).
Add micro-interactions to all buttons and inputs (transform, color change).
